attributes.action: Create an Inaugaration like the USA have for Presidents, the inaugaration would be held possibly at horse guards parade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my view having spoken to many of my peers, an inaugaration for the Prime Minister would stimulate an Intrest in British Politics among the young. Many young people have become interested in American Politics due to the inaugaration of President Obama and I think that this will be a good idea to tria out.
